posts.post_title: FS: Boston Amer. Commons (2021 HA Triple Folder)
posts.post_content:
NO LONGER AVAILABLE 2021 Historical Autographs Originals, Triple Folder. Nice collection of Boston Amer. commons. Please note the back of each card is unknown, as the folder is intact. Included: Arellanes, Spencer, Wagner, T205 Stahl

USPS Priority First Class Shipping is included. Please email me with any questions or for additional photos. Thanks!
